    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AccountRequestController
     
    AddResourceController
     
    AdminDashboardController
    Controller for managing the admin dashboard and their related functionalities.
    Administrator
    Represents an administrator user of the TrackTune system.
    AppConfig
    Configuration class for application-wide settings related to the TrackTune app.
    AudioVideoFileEnum
    Enum representing supported audio and video file extensions.
    AuthenticatedUser
    Represents an authenticated user in the system.
    AuthenticatedUserDashboardController
     
    Author
    Represents an Author entity with an ID, authorship name, and status.
    AuthorAlreadyExistsException
    Exception thrown when an attempt is made to create or add an author that already exists in the system.
    AuthorDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing Author entities in the database.
    AuthorsController
     
    AuthorStatusEnum
    Enumeration representing the status of an Author.
    AuthRequestStatusEnum
    Enum representing the possible statuses of an authentication request.
    BrowserManager
    Singleton class responsible for managing browser-related operations within the application.
    Comment
    Represents a comment associated with a resource and a user, optionally linked to a specific interval of a track.
    CommentDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) implementation for Comment entities.
    Controller
    Abstract base controller class providing common functionality for all controllers.
    DAO<T>
    Generic Data Access Object (DAO) interface defining standard CRUD operations.
    DAOProvider
    Provides access to all DAO (Data Access Object) instances used in the application.
    DatabaseManager
    Dedicated class for data manipulation Using singleton pattern
    DatabaseManager.ResultSetProcessor<T>
    lambda expression (processor type) that contains the result set management
    DBInit
    Class containing all the statements to create database structure Used this approach because the init db is faster and more efficient, because SQLite library functions accept string parameters
    DiscoverController
     
    EditResourceController
     
    EntityAlreadyExistsException
    Exception thrown when an attempt is made to create or add an entity that already exists in the system.
    EntityNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a requested entity cannot be found in the system.
    Frames
    Utility class containing constants for frame dimensions and FXML view paths used throughout the application.
    Genre
    Represents a music genre with an optional ID, a name, and a description.
    GenreDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing Genre entities in the database.
    GenresController
     
    ImageFileEnum
    Enum representing supported image file extensions.
    InstrumentsController
     
    LoginController
     
    Main
    Main class for launching the TrackTune JavaFX application.
    MeController
     
    MediaNotSupportedException
    Exception thrown when an unsupported media format or type is encountered.
    MultimediaResource
    Represents a multimedia resource associated with a track and user.
    MusicalInstrument
    Represents a musical instrument entity with an ID, name, and description.
    MusicalInstrumentDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) for MusicalInstrument entities.
    PendingUser
    Represents a user whose account registration or authentication request is still pending.
    PendingUserDAO
    Data Access Object for the PendingUser entity.
    PendingUserDashboardController
    Controller for the dashboard of a pending user.
    RequestsController
     
    Resource
    Represents a general resource entity associated with a track and a user.
    ResourceDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) implementation for the Resource entity.
    ResourceFileController
     
    ResourceManager
    Singleton class responsible for managing the current Resource instance and providing media-related operations for it.
    ResourcesController
     
    ResourceTypeEnum
    Enumeration representing different resource types, each mapped to an integer value typically stored in the database.
    SessionManager
    Manages the user session throughout the application.
    SQLInjectionException
    Exception thrown to indicate a potential SQL injection attempt.
    SQLiteException
    Exception thrown to indicate an error related to SQLite database operations.
    SQLiteScripts
     
    Strings
    Centralized container for constant string literals used throughout the application.
    Track
    Represents a musical track entity with basic metadata.
    TrackAuthor
    Represents an association between a track and an author.
    TrackAuthorDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) for managing associations between Tracks and Authors.
    TrackDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) for the Track entity.
    TrackGenre
    Represents the association between a Track and a Genre.
    TrackGenreDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) for managing TrackGenre entities.
    TrackInstrument
    Represents an association between a track and an instrument.
    TrackInstrumentDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) implementation for TrackInstrument.
    TrackResourcesController
     
    TracksController
    JavaFX controller for managing the music tracks view in the admin panel.
    TrackTuneException
    Base unchecked exception class for all custom exceptions in the TrackTune application.
    User
    Abstract base class representing a user in the system.
    UserAlreadyExistsException
    Exception thrown when an attempt is made to create or add a user that already exists.
    UserDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) for managing User entities in the database.
    UserNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a user is not found in the system or database.
    UsersController
     
    UserStatusEnum
    Enum representing the possible statuses of a user.
    ViewManager
    Dedicated class to manage view part of the MVC pattern
